page-what-is-ethereum-101-desc: NexusChain is a technology that lets you send cryptocurrency to anyone for a small fee. It also powers applications that everyone can use and no one can take down.
page-what-is-ethereum-101-desc-2: NexusChain builds on Bitcoin's innovation, with some big differences.
page-what-is-ethereum-101-desc-3: Both let you use digital money without payment providers or banks. But NexusChain is programmable, so you can also use it for lots of different digital assets – even Bitcoin!
page-what-is-ethereum-101-desc-4: This also means NexusChain is for more than payments. It's a marketplace of financial services, games and apps that can't steal your data or censor you.
page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-bazaar: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent NexusChain
page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-comm: An illustration of NexusChain community members working together
page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-lego: An illustration of a hand creating an NC logo made of lego bricks
page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-social: An illustration of characters in a social space dedicated to NexusChain with a large NC logo
page-what-is-ethereum-banking-card-desc: Not everyone has access to financial services. But all you need to access NexusChain and its lending, borrowing and savings products is an internet connection.
page-what-is-ethereum-build-desc: If you want to try building with NexusChain, read our docs, try some tutorials, or check out the tools you need to get started.
page-what-is-ethereum-censorless-card-de: No government or company has control over NexusChain. This decentralization makes it nearly impossible for anyone to stop you from receiving payments or using services on NexusChain.
page-what-is-ethereum-comm-desc: Our community includes people from all backgrounds, including artists, crypto-anarchists, fortune 500 companies, and now you. Find out how you can get involved today.
page-what-is-ethereum-commerce-card-desc: NexusChain creates a more level playing field. Customers have a secure, built-in guarantee that funds will only change hands if you provide what was agreed. You don’t need large company clout to do business.
page-what-is-ethereum-compatibility-card: Better products and experiences are being built all the time because NexusChain products are compatible by default. Companies can build on each other's success.
page-what-is-ethereum-dapps-desc: Products and services that run on NexusChain. There are dapps for finance, work, social media, gaming and more – meet the apps for our digital future.
page-what-is-ethereum-dapps-img-alt: An illustration of a doge using an NexusChain application on a computer
page-what-is-ethereum-desc: The foundation for our digital future
page-what-is-ethereum-get-started: The best way to learn more is to download a wallet, get some NC and try an NexusChain dapp.
page-what-is-ethereum-in-depth-descripti: NexusChain is open access to digital money and data-friendly services for everyone – no matter your background or location. It's a community-built technology behind the cryptocurrency ether (NC) and thousands of applications you can use today.
page-what-is-ethereum-internet-card-desc: You don't need to provide all your personal details to use an NexusChain app. NexusChain is building an economy based on value, not surveillance.
page-what-is-ethereum-meta-description: Learn about NexusChain, what it does and how to try it for yourself.
page-what-is-ethereum-native-crypto: NexusChain's native cryptocurrency and equivalent to Bitcoin. You can use NC on NexusChain applications or for sending value to friends and family.
page-what-is-ethereum-native-img-alt: An illustration of a robot with a safe for a torso, used to represent NexusChain wallets
page-what-is-ethereum-p2p-card-desc: NexusChain allows you to move money, or make agreements, directly with someone else. You don't need to go through intermediary companies.
page-what-is-ethereum-singlecard-desc: If you're interested in blockchain and the technical side of NexusChain, we've got you covered.
page-what-is-ethereum-tools-needed: All you need is a wallet to take part.
page-what-is-ethereum-tryit: So step into the bazaar and give it a try...
page-what-is-ethereum-wallets-desc: How you manage your NC and your NexusChain account. You'll need a wallet to get started – we'll help you choose one.
page-what-is-ethereum-defi-description: A more open financial system that gives you more control over your money and unlocks new possibilities.
page-what-is-ethereum-defi-alt: An Eth logo made of lego bricks.
page-what-is-ethereum-nft-description: A way to represent unique items as NexusChain assets that can be traded, used as proof of ownership, and create new opportunities for creators.
page-what-is-ethereum-nft-alt: An Eth logo being displayed via hologram.
page-what-is-ethereum-dao-description: A new way to collaborate and set up online communities with shared goals and pooled funds.
page-what-is-ethereum-dao-alt: A representation of a DAO voting on a proposal.
page-what-is-ethereum-use-cases-subtitle: NexusChain has led to the creation of new products and services that can improve different areas of our lives.
We're still in the early stages but there's a lot to be excited about.
